text: Nereo Laroni (2 September 1942 – 14 July 2019) was an Italian politician. Laroni was a member of the Italian Socialist Party and close ally of Bettino Craxi and Gianni De Michelis. He was the mayor of Venice from 1985 to 1987 and a member of the European Parliament from 1987 to 1994.LARONI Nereo Laroni died on 14 July 2019 in Mestre, at age 76, of problems from heart surgery.Morto Nereo Laroni. Si è spento al'ospedale di Mestre dopo un intervento ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:MEPs for Italy Category:Italian mayors Category:People from Venice Category:Politicians from Veneto
title: Nereo Laroni
